2 Peter__02.1__Sects of perdition: That is, heresies destructive of salvation.
2 Peter__02.11__A railing judgment: That is, they use no railing, nor cursing sentence; not even in their conflicts with the evil angels. See St. Jude, ver. 9.
2 Peter__02.13__The delights of a day: that is, the short delights of this world, in which they place all their happiness.
